item.title: Hubble Space Telescope survey of Magellanic Cloud star clusters. Photometry and astrometry of 113 clusters and early results
item.description: Homogeneous HST photometry and astrometry of 113 clusters revels unexpcted results in the context of young star clusters in the Magellanic Clouds
